html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-09942024-08-30PMO
ActInquiries Act
SubjectPublic Inquiry into Foreign Interference - Order amending the Order in Council P.C. 2023-882 of September 7, 2023
PrecisOrder amending the Order in Council P.C. 2023-882 of September 7, 2023 by replacing paragraph (c) of the Order in order to give access (1) to confidential Cabinet documents that came into existence on or after November 4, 2015 and that were provided to the Independent Special Rapporteur on Foreign Interference in relation to the preparation of his First Report, dated May 23, 2023, and (2) to confidential Cabinet documents that came into existence on or after January 1, 2018 and that were prepared and used by officials from the Canadian Security and Intelligence Service, or other officials involved in national security, to brief Cabinet or its committees on matters related to foreign interference that are strictly operational in nature.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order amending the Order in Council P.C. 2023-882 of September 7, 2023 by replacing paragraph (c) of the Order in order to give access (1) to confidential Cabinet documents that came into existence on or after November 4, 2015 and that were provided to the Independent Special Rapporteur on Foreign Interference in relation to the preparation of his First Report, dated May 23, 2023, and (2) to confidential Cabinet documents that came into existence on or after January 1, 2018 and that were prepared and used by officials from the Canadian Security and Intelligence Service, or other officials involved in national security, to brief Cabinet or its committees on matters related to foreign interference that are strictly operational in nature.
